targets.rawSql: SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'HVAC1'  FROM hvac a WHERE a.`device` = 'HVAC1' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'HVAC2'  FROM hvac a WHERE a.`device` = 'HVAC2' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;

SELECT *
FROM `hvac` v
-- where v.device = 'HVAC1'
ORDER BY v.dtime asc;

SELECT *
FROM `miac` v
-- where v.device = 'HVAC1'
ORDER BY v.dtime asc;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'MiAC1'  FROM miac a WHERE a.`device` = 'MiAC1' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'MiAC2'  FROM miac a WHERE a.`device` = 'MiAC2' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'TH1'  FROM th a WHERE a.`device` = 'TH1' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'TH2'  FROM th a WHERE a.`device` = 'TH2' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;

SELECT *
FROM `th` v
-- where v.device = 'HVAC1'
ORDER BY v.dtime asc;

SELECT v.event_id, v.dtime_event, v.reading
FROM `rejectedevents` v
-- where v.device = 'HVAC1'
ORDER BY v.dtime_event asc;
SELECT a.`dtime_event`, reading AS 'Rejected Events'  FROM rejectedevents a  GROUP BY a.`dtime_event`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'etot'  FROM etot a GROUP BY a.`dtime`;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(v.dtime,'%Y-%m-%d') dtime, v.reading
FROM `etot` v
-- where v.device = 'HVAC1'
ORDER BY v.dtime asc;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dtime, arrival_status, SUM(reading) AS TotalReading, MIN(reading) AS MinReading, MAX(reading) AS MaxReading
FROM water
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d'), arrival_status
order by DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d') asc;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'rejected'  FROM water a WHERE a.`arrival_status` = 'rejected' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'late'  FROM water a WHERE a.`arrival_status` = 'late' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT a.`dtime`, reading AS 'ontime'  FROM water a WHERE a.`arrival_status` = 'ontime' GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%m-%d') as dtime, reading AS 'wtot'  FROM wtot a GROUP BY a.`dtime`;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%m-%d') as dtime, day_count AS 'movementsumday'  FROM movementsumday a GROUP BY a.`dtime`;

SELECT DATE(DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS time_sec, COUNT(*) AS 'Time'  
FROM alarms a 
WHERE a.`alarm_trigger` = 'Time' 
GROUP BY DATE(DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d'));

SELECT DATE(DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS `dtime`, COUNT(*) AS 'Energy'  
FROM alarms a 
WHERE a.`alarm_trigger` = 'Energy' 
GROUP BY DATE(DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d'));

SELECT DATE(DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS `dtime`, COUNT(*) AS 'Energy Time'  
FROM alarms a 
WHERE a.`alarm_trigger` = 'Energy Time' 
GROUP BY DATE(DATE_FORMAT(dtime,'%Y-%m-%d'));
